mapper.select: SELECT b.boardNo , e.empId , b.boardTitle , b.boardContent , b.boardWriteDate , b.boardUpdateDate , b.boardHitcount , b.boardDeleted , bt.boardTypeName , bt.inquiryBoardType , e.empName , e.empRank , t.teamNo , t.teamName FROM BOARD b INNER JOIN BOARDTYPE bt ON b.BOARDTYPENO = bt.BOARDTYPENO INNER JOIN EMP e ON b.EMPID = e.EMPID INNER JOIN EMPINFO ei ON e.EMPID = ei.EMPID LEFT OUTER JOIN TEAM t ON ei.TEAMNO = t.TEAMNO WHERE 1=1 AND BOARDNO = #{boardNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARDHITCOUNT = BOARDHITCOUNT + 1 WHERE 1=1 AND BOARDNO = #{boardNo}
